attributes.action: give customers the option to avoid the TV licence fee by offering them the option to remove the BBC channels from their viewing.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many people feel that the TV licence is an unfair charge and I certainly feel that given the chance I would prefer to have the option of simply not having the BBC channels if it meant not paying for the licence.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
